price: ils ne disposeront d’aucune intercession, sauf celui qui aura pris un engagement avec le Tout Miséricordieux.
arabic: لَّا يَمۡلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yamlikūna al-shafāʿata illā mani ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
